title: Warped Mosco
description:
The Warped Mosco is a strong creature that can be summoned if the right circumstances occur.

First a Mungus infected with exactly 5 Warped Mungus must be placed on the Nether. After that a Crimson Mosquito must bite the Mungus.

Once defeated the Warped Mosco may drop Warped Muscle and Hemolymph Sac on death.
